name: Sidonia the Sorceress
description:
On the eve of her trial for witchcraft, Sidonia says a prayer. "Our heavenly Father, I don't know why I have to suffer for a silly mistake with a love potion. Please God, make thy servant Christian Ludeck see sense and call off this absurd witch trial." Finally, she's got the hang of this prayer business. But will God listen to the witch - or the witch hunter?

Go through the important events of Sidonia's life from her teenage years to her witch trial. Will she take a secret lover, join a bandit gang, seduce a priest, use black magic for a terrible revenge? Will she burn as a witch or convince the judges of her innocence?

Warning! Tester Dorothea von Stettin was shocked by this story and recommends that you don't read it. She was offended by:
Irreverence to God and his priests
Nudity (text only - no pictures)
Sex between unmarried characters
Fortune telling
Sorcery
If you are as easily offended as Dorothea, please don't click that tempting Run Game button.
